description.narrative: For GGF funds will be used to support Navdanya's work in protecting food and seed sovereignty by working to define seeds as a public (common) good, defend farmers' rights as it relates to seed sovereignty, and protect seed and biodiversity throughout agricultural systems. Navdanya will host various training workshops for farmers and like minded organizations and regional conferences for biodiversity and food sovereignty; launch a Seeds of Freedom, Gardens of Hope campaign that focuses on establishing seed banks with small farmers around the world; address issues related to GMO labeling and intellectual property rights on seeds marked by large companies; and update and translate the Global report on Seed Freedom into Spanish, French, and German.
